name: Awesome Game
description:
Ever wanted to play an awesome game? Well, this is the game for you! 5 levels of crappy platforming and an unlockable hard mode! This is not your average game, it's an awesome game! 

[CONTROLS]

Arrow Keys to move left and right

S key to jump

[DEVELOPPER NOTE]

Yo, this is Surge (the older of the two BananaBros). This is the first game I ever made (to completion). I'm aware that it kind of sucks, but cut me some slack. This is hours of effort right here. Please give this game a chance and give feedback!!! Don't, actually, I don't take criticism well. Or at all. 

Thanks for Playing!
